snippet: The plan announced by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, if successful, could let the government turn subsidies for food, fuel and fertilizer into cash transfers.
abstract: Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi announces plans to make bank accounts available to every Indian family, complex goal that, if successful, could allow government to eventually convert subsidies for food, fuel and fertilizer into cash transfers.

byline.contributor: Neha Thirani Bagri contributed reporting from Mumbai, India, and Hari Kumar from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: The plan announced by Prime Minister Narendra Modi, if successful, could let the government turn subsidies for food, fuel and fertilizer into cash transfers.

headline.main: Indian Premier Sets Goal of Banking Access for All
headline.print_headline: Indian Premier Sets Goal of Banking Access for All
